p: Multiple completions of this 9 min battery of tasks reliably increase self-ratings of mental fatigue and is sensitive to many natural interventions [ 48, 49, 50, 51]. Two minutes each of Serial 3 and 7 subtractions is first completed and followed immediately by 5 min of Rapid Visual Information Processing (RVIPâ€”as described above). Mental fatigue is self-rated after each completion of the three tasks.
